yum install boost-system boost-thread boost-python36
###pip3 install PyV8-1.0.dev0-py3.6-linux-x86_64.egg
easy_install-3.6 PyV8-1.0.dev0-py3.6-linux-x86_64.egg

###-or-###
unzip PyV8-1.0.dev0-py3.6-linux-x86_64.egg
cp PyV8.py _PyV8.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so _PyV8.py /usr/local/lib/python3.6/site-packages


use:
import PyV8
ctxt = PyV8.JSContext()
ctxt.enter()

ctxt.eval("//≤‚ ‘÷–Œƒ\nwindow = {};document = {}; window.document = document;")
dir(ctxt.locals)

ctxt.leave()
